TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ThemeColor extends System.Enum

summary.span: 表示 Microsoft 主题的可能的颜色变量。

span.span: Represents possible color variants for the Microsoft themes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个主题都可能有多个颜色变体，即，有可能看上去很相似，但在不同的颜色。Each theme potentially has multiple color variants, which, presumably, are visually similar but in different colors. Luna，例如，具有所有三个颜色变体： 家居、 金属和 NormalColor。Luna, for example, has all three color variants: Homestead, Metallic, and NormalColor. Aero 和 Royale 具有 NormalColor。Aero and Royale have NormalColor. 经典不具有颜色的变体，而是使用配色方案，包括南瓜、 Rose 和云杉。Classic doesn't have a color variant, but instead uses color schemes, including Pumpkin, Rose, and Spruce. 一种配色方案，与颜色变体，不同的构成系统调色板，以及某些特定值字体名称和大小等度量值的颜色的每个定义的值。A color scheme, unlike a color variant, defines values for each of the colors which make up the system palette as well as certain values for certain metrics like font names and sizes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ThemeColor Homestead = int32(1)

summary.span: 由 Luna 主题使用；本地化的颜色名称是“橄榄色”。

span.span: Used by the Luna theme; the localized color name is Olive.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ThemeColor Metallic = int32(2)

summary.span: 由 Luna 主题使用；本地化的颜色名称是“银色”。

span.span: Used by the Luna theme; the localized color name is Sliver.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ThemeColor NormalColor = int32(0)

summary.span: 由 Luna、Aero 和 Classic 主题使用；本地化的颜色名称是“蓝色”。

span.span: Used by the Luna, Aero, and Classic themes; the localized color name is Blue.
